contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated as an indirect quotation. Alternate translation: "I thought they would surely fear me and accept correction so that they would not be cut off from their homes by all that I have planned to do to them." (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-quotations]])
contextId.glQuote: I said, 'Surely you will fear me ... I have planned to do to you.'
